name: ISA-explorer
description: The ISA-explorer is a data discovery tool. It provides a light-weight index for datasets described with the ISA-Tab format. This site is an instance of the ISA-explorer for datasets published in Nature Scientific Data.

provider.name: Springer Nature Scientific Data
provider.comment: This organization provides the ISA-Tab files associated with data descriptor articles

provider.name: ISA team
provider.comment: This organization provides the ISA-explorer tool.

comment: The license applies to the ISA-Tab files available through this data catalogue/application
